extendedInfo.description: Fab is the place to discover the most exciting things in your life. Fab is the #1 rated shopping app for design. More than 12 million people turn to Fab for everyday design across all categories, at all price points. The Fab app for your Android Phone and Tablet gives you 24/7 access any where you are. Benefits: - Smile Guarantee: Our policy is simple. We promise you will love your Fab purchase. If you donât like something - anything - about your Fab experience, contact us. We will make it right. - Free Returns: We want you to love your purchase. If you donât, send it back (for free) and get your money back. No questions asked. - Free Shipping: Orders over $49 ship free. Items that take a little longer for delivery also ship free. - Best Price Match: Find a better price for the same item? Contact us within 14 days of purchase and weâll match it.- Browse design products by color, price, and category. - Design inspiration. - Share your favorite designs and earn credits. - Explore a live feed of popular purchases on Fab. If you have any problems or have comments or suggestions for improving our app, please contact us at support@fab.com. Your feedback is important to us.

reviews.title: Easy to use good deals
reviews.comment: Nice layout. Easy to navigate.
reviews.author: Cynthia Kwan

reviews.title: Its ok but...
reviews.comment: I would give more stars if you could share the stuff you find like on etsy. Plus how much preservatives are in those foods to be able to ship it out everywhere?
reviews.author: Aaliyah Muffin

reviews.comment: My favorite online retailer. Something for everyone and every interest.\tFun to just browse. The latest fashions, beautifully designed housewares. Vintage shows. Art shows, pet show. Foodie show, many others all with an outstanding design aesthetic.
reviews.author: Mark Biernbaum

reviews.title: Cool and stylish stuff yet expensive shipping
reviews.comment: You can find some cool stuff on the site. But it can take forever for anything to be delivered and the shipping cost is ridiculous. If you can deal with those, it can offer you a great deal of items. Note: Shops wisely because certain items are overpriced.
reviews.author: Joon Park

reviews.title: Great products, easy app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a fab user for a few years, since their early, humble beginnings. They carry top notch products at good discounts and help bring exposure to smaller or less known businesses and artists. Their customer service is also fantastic. I recommend fab to all of my friends.
reviews.author: Nora Malchow

reviews.title: Just wonderful
reviews.comment: You will always find something for everyone.  Great customer service. I can\'t say enough about the place, it\'s just wonderful. This app is great it makes shopping at this wonderful site super easy. :-)
reviews.author: Erinn Mayes

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Their discounts makes me proud to be originally high fashioned tell a hand full of originators
reviews.author: Mike Black

reviews.title: Congrats!
reviews.comment: The best app in play store to buy all kind of things! Keep working as hard as up to now developers ;) simply, great! Thanks 4 making us smile :)
reviews.author: larraitz gil iceta

reviews.title: App does not accept my login credentials
reviews.comment: The login that I use for the web shop is not accepted by the app - \'invalid username\'. Deinstalled.
reviews.author: Thomas R

reviews.title: It is easy to use
reviews.comment: It was really easy to use.
reviews.author: danielle evans

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: A fab app and website for fantastic finds :-)
reviews.author: C Wright

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome sight. Many successful purchases!
reviews.author: Craig Fitzgerald

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: Joyous
reviews.author: Alex Gray

reviews.title: Love love love love
reviews.comment: As previously stated. Love.
reviews.author: alicia rondeau

reviews.comment: Great company and easy and beautiful app!
reviews.author: Winston Maupin

reviews.title: Customer service
reviews.comment: Best I have seen in an online store. Well done
reviews.author: Peter Gothold

reviews.title: Slow..crashes a lot
reviews.comment: Ap is great to browse a fun store, but only when it doesn\'t crash or just close itself. When it works, it\'s so slow, jerky & temperamental. Uninstalling. Not worth it.
reviews.author: Jan Reckers

reviews.title: \342\231\245 FAB.  Rarely glitchy though...
reviews.comment: I love Fab. Its my new  addiction. I use the app a lot and it can be glitchy, sometimes. Mostly though, it works fine. Did I mention Fab is the friggin sh*t?
reviews.author: Lanie Saunders

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: There\'s a lot of interesting stuff on here. I have a hard time not buying everything I see. What stops me is the prices. It\'s still fun to look though.
reviews.author: Lisa Kerekes

reviews.title: The most unique products
reviews.comment: We have used FAB to decorate our coffee house in Asheville. You can\'t beat their unique items
reviews.author: Tom Cash
